DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate absorption effect body NN1218 subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating NN1218 Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus 12 month Treated multiple daily insulin injection continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion ( CSII ) 12 month Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.028.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior trial start Smoker ( define subject smoke 5 cigarette equivalent per day ) Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine gum transdermal nicotine patch inpatient period
